1.content:
The sun beats down on you as load the last bale of hay into your Uncle's barn. As you wipe a bead of sweat from your face, you hear a loud crash come from the storage shed. As you go to investigate, you see that an overturned bucket to be the cause of the noise. What concerned you however, was that the bucket was still moving. Small metallic clangs could be heard from within, meaning that whatever had pushed it over was still in there. Picking up a pitchfork to defend yourself with, you gently push over the bucket to reveal what's within. A dim light illuminated the shed as a glowing, 6-inch winged woman was revealed. What was obviously a fairy shook her head before flying up to speak to you at face level.
"Ah thanks for that! Who knows how long I would've been stuck under that thing!" She squeaked in high-pitched, pleasant voice.
"Um, you're welcome?" You say, unsure if what you're seeing is real or the result of heat stroke. "Are you real?"
"Of course I'm real silly! I'm real thankful! To reward you for you aid, I'm going to give you a small fraction of my power."
"Wait, what do you-" Your question is interrupted by the fairy flying up and booping you on the nose, causing a shower of fairy dust to sprinkle over you.
"There you go! With this power, you can swap any physical or mental attributes between two living things, even yourself!"
"Wait, but-"
"Bye! Thanks for your help!" She quickly cut you off, before flying out through a small hole in the roof of the shed.

You are left confused, and with more questions than when you got here. Where should you go to test your new power?
1.title: Summer Blues
